oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Harlan Howard Written Song Recordings - Tape 8
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: The series of recordings features a variety of tracks written by Harlan Howard. The tracks are performed by a variety of artists including: June Sterns, Connie Smith, Sammi Smith, Mel Tillis, Waylon Jennings, Lefty Frizzell, and Burl Ives. The tracks are from a variety of unidentified dates.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Harlan Howard
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) Tyin' Strings (June Sterns) -- (02:28) The Hurtin's All Over (Connie Smith) -- (05:07) From Here to Morning (Sammi Smith) -- (07:52) Life Turned Her That Way (Mel Tillis) -- (10:02) Look Into My Teardrops (Waylon Jennings) -- (12:13) She's Gone, Gone, Gone (Lefty Frizzell) -- (14:26) The Deepening Snow (Burl Ives)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Howard, Harlan;
